title: HoP 113 - Heaven and Earth - Augustine’s City of God
itunes:title: HoP 113 - Heaven and Earth - Augustine’s City of God
description: In his City of God Augustine traces the histories and philosophical underpinnings of two “cities,” one devoted to worldly glory, the other to heavenly bliss.
content:encoded: In his City of God Augustine traces the histories and philosophical underpinnings of two “cities,” one devoted to worldly glory, the other to heavenly bliss.
itunes:subtitle: In his City of God Augustine traces the histories and philosophical underpinnings of two “cities,” one devoted to worldly glory, the other to heavenly bliss.
itunes:summary: In his City of God Augustine traces the histories and philosophical underpinnings of two “cities,” one devoted to worldly glory, the other to heavenly bliss.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson
